verses.verse: <S%H3196>Wine<s%> is a <S%H9238>mocker,<s%> <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink<s%> a <S%H1993>brawler,<s%> And <S%H3605>whoever<s%> is <S%H7686>intoxicated<s%> by it is not <S%H2449>wise.<s%>

The <S%H367>terror<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is like the <S%H5099>growling<s%> of a <S%H3715>lion;<s%> He who <S%H9378>provokes<s%> him to <S%H9378>anger<s%> <S%H2398>forfeits<s%> his own <S%H5315>life.<s%>
<S%H7674>Keeping<s%> <S%H7674>away<s%> from <S%H7379>strife<s%> is an <S%H9202>honor<s%> for a <S%H376>man,<s%> But <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H191>fool<s%> will <S%H1566>quarrel.<s%>
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> does not <S%H9177>plow<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> the <S%H2779>autumn,<s%> So he <S%H7592>begs<s%> during the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> and <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>nothing.<s%>
A <S%H6098>plan<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> is [like] <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> But a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> <S%H1802>draws<s%> it out.
<S%H7230>Many<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7121>proclaims<s%> his <S%H376>own<s%> <S%H2617>loyalty,<s%> But <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H529>trustworthy<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>?
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H8537>integrity<s%> â€“ How <S%H835>blessed<s%> are his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.
A <S%H4428>king<s%> who <S%H3427>sits<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1779>justice<s%> <S%H2219>Disperses<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H559>say,<s%> "I have <S%H2135>cleansed<s%> my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> I am <S%H2891>pure<s%> from my <S%H9128>sin<s%>"?
<S%H68>Differing<s%> <S%H68>weights<s%> and <S%H374>differing<s%> <S%H374>measures,<s%> <S%H1571>Both<s%> <S%H8147><s%> of them are <S%H8441>abominable<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
It is by his <S%H4611>deeds<s%> that a <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H5234>distinguishes<s%> himself <S%H518>If<s%> his <S%H6467>conduct<s%> is <S%H2134>pure<s%> and <S%H3477>right.<s%>
The <S%H8085>hearing<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%> and the <S%H7200>seeing<s%> <S%H5869>eye,<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8147><s%> of them.

Do not <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H3423>become<s%> <S%H3423>poor;<s%> <S%H6491>Open<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> [and] you will be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>food.<s%>
<S%H7451>"Bad,<s%> <S%H7451>bad,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H7069>buyer;<s%> But when he <S%H235>goes<s%> his <S%H235>way,<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> he <S%H1984>boasts.<s%>

<S%H3426>There<s%> is <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and an <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H6443>jewels;<s%> But the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> are a <S%H637>more<s%> <S%H3366>precious<s%> <S%H3627>thing.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H6148>becomes<s%> <S%H6148>surety<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger;<s%> And for <S%H5237>foreigners,<s%> <S%H9111>hold<s%> him in <S%H9111>pledge.<s%>

<S%H3899>Bread<s%> obtained by <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> is <S%H6156>sweet<s%> to a <S%H376>man,<s%> But <S%H310>afterward<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2687>gravel.<s%>
<S%H3559>Prepare<s%> <S%H4284>plans<s%> by <S%H6098>consultation,<s%> And <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> by <S%H8458>wise<s%> <S%H8458>guidance.<s%>
He who <S%H1980>goes<s%> about as a <S%H7400>slanderer<s%> <S%H1540>reveals<s%> <S%H5475>secrets,<s%> Therefore do not <S%H6148>associate<s%> with a <S%H9464>gossip.<s%> <S%H8193><s%>
He who <S%H7043>curses<s%> his father or his <S%H1>mother,<s%> His <S%H517>lamp<s%> will <S%H5216>go<s%> out in <S%H1846>time<s%> of <S%H380>darkness.<s%>
An <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H9048>gained<s%> <S%H926>hurriedly<s%> at the <S%H7223>beginning,<s%> Will not be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> in the <S%H319>end.<s%>
Do not <S%H559>say,<s%> "I will <S%H9608>repay<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%>"; <S%H6960>Wait<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and He will <S%H3467>save<s%> you.
<S%H68>Differing<s%> <S%H68>weights<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And a <S%H4820>false<s%> <S%H3976>scale<s%> is not <S%H2896>good.<s%>
<S%H120>Man<s%>'s <S%H4703>steps<s%> are [ordained] by the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> then can man <S%H995>understand<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>?

It is a <S%H4170>snare<s%> for a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H9236>say<s%> <S%H9236>rashly,<s%> "It is <S%H6944>holy!<s%>" And <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H5088>vows<s%> to <S%H1239>make<s%> <S%H1239>inquiry.<s%>
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2219>winnows<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> And <S%H7725>drives<s%> the [threshing] <S%H212>wheel<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

The <S%H5397>spirit<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2664>Searching<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2315>innermost<s%> <S%H2315>parts<s%> of his <S%H990>being.<s%>
<S%H2617>Loyalty<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> And he <S%H5582>upholds<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> by <S%H2617>righteousness.<s%>

The <S%H8597>glory<s%> of <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men<s%> is their <S%H3581>strength,<s%> And the <S%H1926>honor<s%> of <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H2205>men<s%> is their <S%H7872>gray<s%> <S%H7872>hair.<s%>
<S%H2250>Stripes<s%> that <S%H6482>wound<s%> <S%H4838>scour<s%> away <S%H9563>evil,<s%> And <S%H4347>strokes<s%> [reach] the <S%H2315>innermost<s%> <S%H990>parts.<s%>
